personal_info.name: Gautam Parasnis
personal_info.headline: Program Manager at Capgemini
personal_info.summary:
Pragram Manager with strong experience in Program and Projects management, handling end to end Delivery for big and complex projects in services industry. Experience in handling multiple projects with mix of development, maintenance & support in diversified technologies like Java, HTML, JS, Angular JS, SQL and Cloud. Expertise in various models like Waterfall, Agile SCRUM, Iterative, SLA based & L2, L3 support. Effectively managed projects/programs in domains like Manufacturing, Telecom, Healthcare, Backup & Recovery and Virtualization with team size of 200+. Six Sigma Black Belt & PMP Certified with strong process background. Worked with top customers like GE, Procter & Gamble, Vodafone, HP, Electrolux across continents. Specialties: Program Management, Project Management & People Management

...
